pages.title: Eye of Horus
pages.text: You're holding one right now. The $(thing)Eye of Horus$() is both a key and a container. In its base form, right-clicking it opens these very Archives, the collective knowledge of the Architects.$(br2)But the Eye has a second function. When charged in an $(l:alientech:machines/ancient_charger)Ancient Charger$(), it becomes an $(item)Activated Eye of Horus$(), a portable energy storage device holding up to $(energy)5,000,000 FE$().

pages.title: Activation
pages.text: To activate the Eye, place it inside an $(l:alientech:machines/ancient_charger)Ancient Charger$() and let it absorb energy. Once it has any charge, it transforms into its activated form.$(br2)The activated Eye stores massive amounts of FE and can power other items or machines. It's essentially the Architects' version of a portable battery, except it also contains all of human history in its memory banks.
